recipes.label: Press Gangs
recipes.startdescription: Some harbor press gangs have decided I am no longer welcome to conduct business on their turf. They suggest I leave town, quickly. [Adress this challenge with Forge or Edge.]

recipes.label: Press Gangs
recipes.startdescription: Some harbor press gangs have decided I am no longer welcome to conduct business on their turf. They suggest I leave town, quickly. [Adress this challenge with Forge or Edge.]

recipes.label: A Show of Strength
recipes.description: I part them like a wave and leave them crawling in my wake.

recipes.label: Outmuscled
recipes.description: Their wiry, stained overalls form a wall as insurmountable as reinforced concrete. I must retreat, and try again later.
